attributes.action: Advise the Chancellor to institute a National Fuel Pricing Strategy and to ignore the protests from the oil companies as they already make a considerable profit from the people of Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A National Fuel Price will mean that all motorists, be they diesel or petrol users, would pay the same throughout the country. It should also include the cost of heating oils which, as do petrol/diesel, vary enormously depending on the outlet.
